ğŸ½Â A spicy food lover who are addicted to desserts as well.
ğŸ”­Â Peaceful life with some adventures is the best for me.
Computer ScienceğŸ’» Majored in Computer Science for both undergraduation and graduation study.
3 years of learning CS experience in foundamental related courses (e.g. Algorithm, Computer Architecture, Computer Network, Operating System, …). 2 years of learning/research experience on Machine Learning & Graph Neural Network. 2 years of learning/working experience on Software Development & Infrastructure. These three experiences are timely overlapping, of course :-)
Currently have more interest in backend development and infrastructure. But will be happy to seek opportunities of learning frontend framework.
Related Tech Skills Languages: C/C++, Python, Go, Ruby, HTML, CSS, Java, Javascript, Matlab, SQL, Verilog Software Development Tools: Docker, Drone, Git, Kubernetes, Kafka, Airflow, Snowflake, PostgreSQL, Redis AWS Services: API Gateway, Lambda, DynamoDB, OpenSearch, S3, CloudFormation, CodePipeline, SES, SQS, Lex, SageMaker, EventBridge, Personalize, EMR Research Packages: PySpark, Pytorch, Flask, TensorFlow, Plotly, Numpy, Pandas, Scikit-Learn, Matplotlib Other Tools: Latex, GEM5, Quartus, Visio, Linux, Android Studio ArtğŸ­ğŸ¤ğŸ¬ My four comfort activities: Musicals, Immersive Plays, Pop Music, Film.
No idea why I am so addicted to it. Probabily because I am kind of introvert person who enjoys gaining happiness from external stuff other than interpersonal communication.
Musicals Just listing plays that I saw in-person.
Wicked: My musical enlightments. Watched it in London’s West End. Favorite song: “Defying Gravity”. Mozart, l’opÃ©ra rock: First musicals watched in China. Favorite song: “Vivre Ã  en crever”. RomÃ©o et Juliette: Not very impressed. But not bad at least. Dear Evan Hansen: First musicals watched in Broadway. Favorite song: “Waving Through A Window”. Phantom of the Opera: Classic. Must-to-see musical. Favorite song: “Phantom of the Opera”. Les MisÃ©rables: Fantastic performance. Completely exceeded expectation. Into the Woods: I love Gavin! Extraodinary and talented actor. Favorite song: “Agony”. Sleep No More (Immersive Work of Theatre) MY FAVORITE PERFORMANCE IN NYC!!
NOTHING IS BETTER THAN IT!!!
I WILL DEFINITELY RECOMMEND IT TO ANYONE VISITS NYC!!!
You will finally get your heartbreak in Mckittrick Hotel. But the most attractive part for me is that I was always full of hope and stress before entering it. There are so many mystery places and great experience to explore. Pop Music I am OK with any genre, so long as it meets my tastes.
Favorite Singers: Charlie Puth [I went to his concert this year!] Taylor Swift Shawn Mendes Ed Sheeran …. [Still so many other singers that I can’t list all of them hereğŸ¥²] Favorite Songs: Ehhh, actually I put different songs on repeat for different period. I may just share my 2022 playlist here :-)
Film Popcorn movies lover. Watch almost all popular fiction movies in cinema. Love the feeling of soaking myself into stories. Here are my favorite film IPs:
Marvel: Most favorite charactor is Loki. I LOVE villains. ğŸ¤¤ Harry Potter: Malfoy, my beloved! Pirates of the Caribbean: My dear Sparrow!!! Dune: No one can survive through TimothÃ©e’s eyes?! Doctor Who: 10th and 11th Doctors are the best! Game of Throne / House of Dragon: Needless to say. I paid for HBO membership just for these. Love, Death and Robots: One of the top animes I have ever seen. Life TrajectoriesğŸ—º Born in Hangzhou, Zhejiang, CN. Lived there until High School.
ğŸš—
High School in Fuyang, Zhejiang, CN.
âœˆï¸
Undergradution Study in Xi’an, Shaanxi, CN.
âœˆï¸
Gradution Study in New York City, NY, US.
